page.title: 12INDUSTRIES IN BEXLEYHEATH
page.content: Our area is mainly residential, but in the last five years there has been much new industrial development, especially in Crayford. This is because we are near to London and the Channel Ports, and have good road and rail links with both. We have many different types of industry situated in two industrial estates. There are silk screen printers, light engineering works, electrical and electronic industries, scientific and professional instrument makers, building and construction works, printing, publishing and commercial stationery to name but a few. In Crayford there is also a training workshop where young people are given instruction in catering, carpentry and furniture repair. This is part of the Youth Training Scheme.
